shortDescription.default: A package with webparts created for all SPO developers in MSF. Prepared for you by MSF SITS team.

longDescription.default: This package includes webparts for all SPO site designers in MSF. Presently there are 4 webpart - 1) Welcome user (MSF) which can help you to create a simple welcome message, 2) Button (MSF) which give SPO designers much more visual options than standard SPO Button or Quick Links webpart, 3) Tabs (MSF) which allows designers to create dynamic content tabs, 4) Anchor list (MSF) which creates a list of clickable buttons navigation to all your headings(anchors) on your page.

features.title: MSF webparts package
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the msf-webparts solution.
